442 Muslims trying to take over Japan DEPORT posted 3 days ago by dirtysanchez69 32 comments award share download report block

If we must have meat, it should be raised in an ethical manner and slaughtered humanely. Muslims: Hold my knife... Lefties: Stunning and brave. permalink award report block reply MAGALADON9 12 points 3 days ago Food is a traditional wedge issues for islamofication You see by claiming it's just better quality etc you get them to agree and then ONLY MUSLIMS CAN WORK IN HALAL FOOD so you carve out schools and other government areas like prisons and now you have a corner on food and a Muslim only job program and grift opportunities permalink award report block reply Shih_Tabed 12 points 3 days ago Hopefully the Yakuza is still the Yakuza. permalink award report block reply LeRiverDanube 11 points 3 days ago they're getting thwarted once sanseito got elected in. Though would be nice if kurd population drops to 0% permalink award report block reply MakingArrowsOrange 8 points 3 days ago Why the hell does Japan have a .3% muslim population? That's what i want to know. permalink award report block reply Standingoak 1 points 3 days ago Indonesians permalink parent award report block reply _Sully_ 7 points 3 days ago Yeah, how about they eat their own shit. Don't even move a single inch for these people. permalink award report block reply NYforTrump 5 points 3 days ago Is that a Japanese woman in a hijab?  What a disgrace.   Worthy of seppuku. permalink award report block reply SuperSilly 5 points 3 days ago I used to go to a place called Pei Wei for their sweet and sour pork.... one day, I went in there and they said.... no more pork!!!! I was like waaaa? And another time I went to a small gas station and couldn't find pork rinds! The hispanic girl behind the counter rolled her eyes and said "stupid Muslim owner, no more chicharrones! permalink award report block reply Nellie_the_Beaut 4 points 3 days ago We have one legacy diner in the middle of town.  It has been in operation for 45 years.  Traditional place with red booths, bright lights, lots of windows, checkered floor. Known for their big breakfasts of bacon & egg breakfast burritos, biscuits and sausage gravy, ham steaks with fried eggs, pork chops smothered in gravy.  The owners retired last year and sold it to an out of towner.  Turns out he was Muslim and the menu radically changed and all pork was taken off the menu. Bacon replaced with some awful “beef bacon”, no gravy, nasty tasting stuff.  Without telling customers.  People noticed quickly and stopped going there.  It was just sold again to some other Muslims who turned it into a shake and burger drive up.  No pork on the menu.  Nobody’s going there still.  We’ll see how long that lasts. permalink parent award report block reply morememesplz 2 points 2 days ago Panda Express used to sell char siu pork. Delicious. Then I guess they caved to offended Muslims and got rid of it? That's the rumor. No more pork items. They claim because of price volatility of pork but every Chinese restaurants serve pork! permalink parent award report block reply fluffykitten 4 points 3 days ago I support halal pork only permalink award report block reply South_Florida_Guy 4 points 3 days ago Jizzlam is a virus that needs to be eradicated permalink award report block reply Nomad899 2 points 3 days ago Like HIV it infects and kills the host permalink parent award report block reply Sicsempertyrannis76 1 points 3 days ago is Halal similar to Kosher permalink award report block reply Nomad899 2 points 3 days ago Yes permalink parent award report block reply socrates2 1 points 3 days ago They have the healthiest population diet wise in the world. Their school lunches are fresh made and they dont allow students to bring lunch from home. Their childhood obesity as a result (not genetics - see japanese fatsos in Hawaii) is zero due to these food policies. For them to change the entire schools lunch for some nonsense is a crime. permalink award report block reply Mike_Hoxbigg 1 points 2 days ago Stand strong, Japan. DO NOT bend to the will of the foreigner, especially the backwater MUSLIM who does not respect any culture but his own. Show the world how a monoculture stays great by preventing foreign influence. permalink award report block reply freedom4Speech 1 points 3 days ago Comment removed by community moderators. permalink award report block reply
